title: Niqab in the public service – a non-issue (PSAC - Public Service Alliance of Canada) ...
text: ( Source : PSAC - Public Service Alliance of Canada ) During the election campaign, the Harper Conservatives have stated that they will not rule out the ban of the Niqab in the public service. A ban on any religious symbol in the public
